page.title: 13PLAYING FIELD
page.content:
{The Playing Field}is situated near the Community Centre. There is one{ {football pitch}and one{netball pitch.} There is also a small house where the sports club keep their equipment. Every Wednesday and Saturday, during the summer months, there are local football and netball matches played between 7.30 and 9.30 p.m.
Every three years the{North Isles {Sports}are held in this playing field. There are also{"Home Games"}between Sanday and the neighbouring islands of Stronsay and Westray for the{Grimond {Cup;}and against the Mainland Parishes for{The Orkney Parish Cup.}The{Annual {Cattle Show}is held in that part of the field nearest the Community Centre, where{The Annual Industrial {Show}is being held on the same day.
